script.text: function load$InputInvoiceItemsCreate$(d){for(var e=d.grid,b=[],c=[],a=0;a<e._$k.length;a++){var f=e._$k[a].split(";");Array.add(b,f[0]);Array.add(c,f[1])}d.setItemValues("keys, nhieu_dvt",[b,c])}function on$InputInvoiceItemsCreate$Complete(a,b){a.grid._formScript="refresh$InputInvoiceItems$(this, "+b+");"}function checkItemCode(f){var b=f.getItemValue("ma_vt");if(b[b.length-1]!="#")return false;for(var c=b.split("#"),e="",d=[],a=c.length-1;a>=0;a--)if(!c[a])e=e+"#";else d.push(c[a]);return d.length>1?false:true} &ScriptIrregular;
